trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Fort Collins
There were no other sightings in Fort Collins on or around July 21st 2012
Summary: two green lights flying west, invisible surfaceish. Another one followed about 50 ft behind.
divs: sighting detailsmy friend and i were riding our bikes on the path between drake and centerish. we saw two green lights floating\soaring west in the sky. very low, too low for a plane, then a single one followed the two a decent amount of ft away. they all were very invisible looking but emitting a greenish reflectivey glowey light. they just kept flying west, i could see them for a while, about 20 ish seconds but then they flew too far west.
